welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Atoka, where small town charm meets southern hospitality! Known for its scenic landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Millington Regional Jetport Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Millington Regional Jetport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memphis International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Memphis International Airport serves mainly Delta and Delta Connection flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Memphis International Airport serves mainly Southwest, Frontier, and Allegiant flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
